metadata.synopsis: Player meets the skeletons controlled by Balthazar, the Necromancer, who is barricaded elsewhere in the temple. His skeletons meet the player in the hallway. The skeletons sense an attack and retreat to help defend the necromancer.The skeletons speak individually, in turns, but are all the mouthpieces of Balthazar, the necromancer. NOTE: the three skeletal voices/speakers can differ, but should flow in terms of tone as though they're ultimately coming from the one person - transmitting his words.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Approach the trio of skeletons near X:-717 Y:798

2.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 000 (speaking)NodeContext: Terse, rising anger

4.speaker: Reconstituted Marksman
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 000 (speaking)NodeContext: Terse, rising anger

19.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
19.text: Your animal flesh does not fool me. You do not belong here.
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 000 (speaking)NodeContext: Terse, rising anger

3.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
3.text: Yet the Absolute has blessed you. Perhaps you will be useful. Present yourself at my camp and -
3.context: NodeContext: Judging the player, recognising they may be a useful pawn. Thought is interrupted at the end as the skeleton senses something (end of sentence would have been 'I will judge your usefulness')

11.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
11.text: - stupid, worm-infested cockhead! You have awoken the shadows!
11.context:
CinematicNodeContext: A low rumbling sound shudders through the temple. Camera focuses on Skeleton 002, who turns its head, reacting to the noise before speaking with sudden anger and alarm.
Please reduce the transitioning into and out of line. The Skelton should appear as if subtly breathing in life. He's currently feeling like robot batteries running out.  Keep delivery closer to S_SHA_TadpoledSkeletons_Skelly_000.NodeContext: Sudden anger and alarm - we've alerted a dark presence

54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 000 (speaking)NodeContext: Terse, rising anger

25.speaker: Narrator
25.text: *Your mind upends. Somehow, in the decayed soup of this creature's brain, a tadpole lives. Another presence nurtures it, manipulates it like a puppet.*

41.speaker: Player
41.text: No - you do not belong. This is the Dark Lady's house. She has no use for old, faithless bones.

52.speaker: Shadowheart
52.text: No - you do not belong. This is the Dark Lady's house. She has no use for old, faithless bones.

43.speaker: Shadowheart
43.text: And you do? I won't allow some walking, talking feast for stray dogs where I belong or not.

39.speaker: Player
39.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 001 (speaking)

35.speaker: Player
35.text: Z'rell sent me. I'm here to help a certain Balthazar.
35.context: InternalNodeContext: This question if the player received a quest from Z'rell to go find Balthazar.

20.speaker: Reconstituted Marksman
20.text: I see she sent the husk of Minthara to accompany you.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 002 (speaking)NodeContext: contemptuous

57.speaker: Reconstituted Marksman
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 002 (speaking)NodeContext: Contemptuous towards the mention of Z'rell

34.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
34.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 001 (speaking)

Please reduce the transitioning into and out of line. The Skelton should appear as if subtly breathing in life. He's currently feeling like robot batteries running out.  Keep delivery closer to S_SHA_TadpoledSkeletons_Skelly_000.NodeContext: Bullish

22.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
22.text: Z'rell lacks in many ways, but I do not. Leave, before -
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 000 (speaking)NodeContext: Breaks off before finishing sentence - sensing something. Full sentence would have been 'before you attract trouble'

9.text: My forces are split. The defences are thin.
9.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 001 (speaking)

16.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
16.text: Rally on me - a wall of bone and blade against the darkness. Now!
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 000 (speaking). Addressed to other skeletons.NodeContext: Addressing the other skeletons - transmitting the orders of their master.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: Three corpses sharing one personality. Who - or what - am I speaking to?

44.speaker: Reconstituted Marksman
44.text: Your pet drow, Minthara, should recognise me. I'm her superior after all. As for these creatures.

48.speaker: Reconstituted Marksman
48.text: I am their creator. I saved them from life.
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 002 (speaking)NodeContext: Hint of pride

42.speaker: Reconstituted Duellist
42.text: From their skin and their flesh. Now they serve me. Leave, before -
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 000 (speaking)NodeContext: Breaks off before finishing sentence - sensing something. Full sentence would have been 'before you attract trouble'

49.speaker: Player
49.text: You leave. I don't answer to bone piles.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 002 (speaking)NodeContext: Hint of pride and indignation

30.speaker: Reconstituted Marksman
30.text: Bones? They are more than bones.
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 002 (speaking)NodeContext: Hint of pride and indignation

51.text: More than skin, blood, hair and piss. They are more. They are mine. Now leave, before -
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera focuses on Skeleton 000 (speaking)NodeContext: Breaks off before finishing sentence - sensing something. Full sentence would have been 'before you attract trouble'

60.speaker: Player
60.text: I've heard of making instruments out of bones but this is just ridiculous.
